hero.title: Your AI Partner for Smarter Growth
hero.subtitle: Zyra AI is the AI-powered platform built to help Shopify merchants boost sales, maximize ROI, and save time every week.
hero.description: Transform your eCommerce business with intelligent automation that works while you focus on what matters most—growing your brand.

vision.title: Why Zyra AI Exists
vision.paragraph1: Running a successful Shopify store shouldn't mean spending hours on repetitive tasks. Merchants face constant pressure to optimize product listings, create engaging content, recover abandoned carts, and track performance—all while trying to grow their business.
vision.paragraph2: Zyra AI solves this by combining cutting-edge AI with proven eCommerce strategies. We automate the heavy lifting so you can focus on strategy, creativity, and customer relationships. Our platform learns from your store's unique patterns and continuously improves your results.
vision.paragraph3: We built Zyra AI to be the growth partner every merchant deserves—intelligent, tireless, and always working to drive measurable results.

features.title: Powerful Features, Real Results
features.subtitle: Five integrated pillars designed to transform your Shopify store into a growth engine.

productOptimization.title: Product Optimization & SEO
productOptimization.description: AI-generated product descriptions, SEO titles, and meta tags that convert visitors into customers. Automatically optimize your entire catalog for search engines and shoppers.

conversionBoost.title: Conversion Boosting
conversionBoost.description: Intelligent cart recovery, upsell suggestions, and behavioral triggers that turn browsers into buyers. Increase your average order value with AI-powered recommendations.

contentBranding.title: Content & Branding
contentBranding.description: Maintain a consistent brand voice across all channels. Generate compelling marketing copy, email campaigns, and product content that resonates with your audience.

roiTracking.title: Performance & ROI Tracking
roiTracking.description: Real-time analytics dashboards show exactly what's working. Track revenue impact, conversion rates, and campaign performance to make data-driven decisions.

workflowTools.title: Workflow Automation
workflowTools.description: Streamline bulk operations, schedule content updates, and automate publishing to Shopify. Save hours every week with intelligent workflow tools.

timeSaved.label: Saved Weekly
timeSaved.description: Automate content creation and optimization tasks that used to take hours.

salesBoost.label: Sales Growth
salesBoost.description: Merchants see average 3x increase in conversions within 90 days.

roiMaximization.label: Average ROI
roiMaximization.description: Every dollar invested in Zyra AI returns 5x in increased revenue.

future.title: Your Growth Partner That Never Stops Learning
future.description: Zyra AI isn't just software—it's an AI partner that evolves with your business. Every campaign, every optimization, every interaction makes our algorithms smarter. As your store grows, Zyra AI grows with you, continuously finding new ways to boost your performance.
future.tagline: The future of eCommerce isn't just automated—it's intelligent.

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.description: At Zyra AI, we take your privacy seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: Welcome to Zyra AI, an AI-powered platform designed to help Shopify merchants optimize their stores, boost conversions, and grow their businesses. We are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data with transparency and care.
introduction.paragraph2: This Privacy Policy explains how Zyra AI collects, uses, stores, and shares your personal information when you use our platform. It also outlines your rights regarding your data and how you can exercise them.
introduction.paragraph3: By using Zyra AI, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please discontinue use of our services.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
informationCollection.intro: We collect several types of information to provide and improve our services:

accountInfo.title: Account Information
items: Name, email address, and contact details you provide during registration
Shopify store URL and basic store information
Subscription and billing information (processed securely through payment gateways)

usageData.title: Usage Data
items: Product data you upload or sync from your Shopify store
AI-generated content, optimization history, and campaign performance
User interactions within the platform (clicks, page views, feature usage)
Device information, IP address, browser type, and operating system

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
items: Essential cookies for authentication and session management
Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns and improve our service
Preference cookies to remember your settings and language choices

integrations.title: Third-Party Integration Data
items: Shopify store data accessed through our Shopify integration
Email campaign data from SendGrid integration
Payment information processed through payment gateways (we never store full card details)
AI model interactions with OpenAI for content generation

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.intro: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
informationUse.legalBasis: Legal Basis (GDPR): We process your data based on (1) Contract Performance: to provide services you've subscribed to, (2) Legitimate Interests: to improve our platform and ensure security, and (3) Consent: for marketing communications, which you can withdraw at any time.

items.provideServices: To provide and maintain our AI-powered optimization services
items.optimizePerformance: To analyze and optimize your store's performance with personalized insights
items.improveFeatures: To develop new features and improve existing functionality
items.communicate: To send you service updates, promotional content, and respond to your inquiries
items.security: To detect, prevent, and address security issues or fraudulent activity
items.compliance: To comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing & Disclosure
dataSharing.intro: Zyra AI does not sell your personal information. We do not sell or share your personal information for cross-context behavioral advertising. We only share data in the following circumstances:

thirdParty.title: Service Providers
thirdParty.description: We work with trusted third-party providers (Shopify, PayPal, Razorpay, SendGrid, OpenAI, Supabase) to deliver our services. These providers are bound by strict data protection agreements and only access data necessary for their specific functions.

legal.title: Legal Requirements
legal.description: We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or governmental regulation, or if we believe disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, your safety, or the safety of others.

businessTransfers.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfers.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the new owner. We will notify you before your data is transferred and becomes subject to a different privacy policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.paragraph1: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our security practices include:
dataSecurity.paragraph2: While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but are committed to continuously improving our security practices.

measures.encryption: End-to-end encryption for data transmission using HTTPS/TLS
measures.accessControls: Strict access controls and authentication mechanisms
measures.monitoring: Regular security monitoring and threat detection
measures.regularAudits: Periodic security audits and vulnerability assessments

userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
userRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
userRights.ccpaNote: CCPA Rights (California Residents): You have the right to know what personal information we collect, the right to delete your personal information (subject to certain exceptions), and the right to opt-out of sale/sharing of personal information (we do not sell or share your data). California residents can exercise their CCPA rights by contacting us at privacy@zyra.ai.

rights.access: Access: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
rights.correction: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
rights.deletion: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal obligations)
rights.portability: Data Portability: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
rights.optOut: Opt-Out: Unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time
rights.complaint: Complaint: Lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority

cookiesTracking.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookiesTracking.paragraph1: Zyra AI uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience and understand how you use our platform.
cookiesTracking.paragraph2: You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may limit some functionality of our platform.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for authentication, security, and basic platform functionality

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand usage patterns to improve our service

preferences.title: Preference Cookies
preferences.description: Remember your settings, language, and customization choices

thirdPartyIntegrations.title: Third-Party Integrations
thirdPartyIntegrations.intro: Zyra AI integrates with the following third-party services to provide our functionality:

services.shopify: Shopify: Store data synchronization and product management
services.sendgrid: SendGrid: Email campaign delivery and performance tracking
services.razorpay: Razorpay: Secure payment processing for India
services.openai: OpenAI: AI-powered content generation and optimization
services.supabase: Supabase: Authentication and database storage - https://supabase.com/privacy
services.analytics: Analytics providers: Usage tracking and performance monitoring

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.paragraph1: We retain your personal data for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with our services. If you close your account, we will delete or anonymize your data within 90 days, except where we are required to retain it for legal, regulatory, or security purposes.
dataRetention.paragraph2: Aggregated and anonymized data that cannot identify you may be retained indefinitely for analytics and product improvement.
dataRetention.paragraph3: You can request early deletion of your data at any time by contacting our support team.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.paragraph1: Zyra AI operates globally and may transfer your data to servers located in different countries, including the United States and European Union. We ensure that international data transfers comply with applicable data protection laws, including GDPR, CCPA, and other regional regulations.
internationalTransfers.paragraph2: When transferring data internationally, we implement appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) and ensure our service providers adhere to equivalent data protection standards.

policyUpdates.title: Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.paragraph1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices, legal requirements, or service offerings. When we make significant changes, we will notify you via email or through a prominent notice on our platform.
policyUpdates.paragraph2: Your continued use of Zyra AI after any changes to this policy constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms. We encourage you to review this policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please don't hesitate to contact us:
contact.support: For general support inquiries, visit our Support Center in the dashboard

childrensPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrensPrivacy.paragraph1: Zyra AI is not intended for users under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16.
childrensPrivacy.paragraph2: If we become aware that we have collected personal data from a child under 16, we will take steps to delete such information as quickly as possible.
childrensPrivacy.paragraph3: If you believe we have collected information from a child under 16, please contact us immediately at privacy@zyra.ai.

cta.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
cta.description: Our team is here to help you understand how we protect your data.
